title: Reunited and It Feels So Good
description:
Jay an Dan are back together again! Jay tells the gang about a woman at his show who had multiple nip slips and the guys take calls from people who have experienced similar situations.

Stream "The Bonfire with Big Jay Oakerson & Dan Soder" for 3 months free on the SiruisXM app! Offer Details Apply: www.SiriusXM.com/Bonfire

Follow us on all social media @TheBonfireXM

@DanSoder www.DanSoder.com

@BigJayOakerson www.BigJayOakerson.com
author: podcasts@siriusxm.com (SiriusXM)
